channel.title: Need help with items!
channel.description:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Ok, so on my server you couldnt pickup items above 10000, but i followed a tut made by /TICO135/ and now you can, so if i do :pickup 10045 1, i get a strength cape(t), it looks fine no problems, i wield it, BUT if i take it off i get a null item (dwarf head), and also the cape turns into dwarf head null, so if i take it off i get 2 nulls, how do i fix this?
*EDIT* someone please help me i really want to fix this!

item.title: Need help with items!
item.dc:creator: @kyled123 kyled123
item.description:

Ok, so on my server you couldnt pickup items above 10000, but i followed a tut made by /TICO135/ and now you can, so if i do
